title: Kirinomiya-senpai Cannot Solve The Mystery - Novel Updates
tags: Beautiful Female Lead   Murders   Mystery Solving
author: Mimori Ichiru   御守いちる
description:
A great detective who appears out of nowhere and solves cases with brilliant deductions. Kirinomiya Saika, who acts like this, is my senior. She's the daughter of a conglomerate, not someone that an ordinary student like me can approach, but for some reason I'm being made her assistant. As I’m dragged along to crime scenes, a real murder case finally occurs. 
'The mystery that wanders in the depths of darkness, I will expose it to the light of day.”
No matter how much my senpai shows off her deductions, she cannot solve the mystery.
>
